Package com.view

This package contains every element used to display things. The procedure is the following : 1 - The MainView is launched. It contains the menu bar and a panel with a card layout. 2 - The first panel is displayed, StartingPanel. By triggering certains actions you can trigger a function of the card layout to change to a different panel. 3 - To add a new panel, add a new identifier to PanelIdentifier, add the panel to mainPanel with your identifier, then call switchToPanel() with your identifier to make it appear
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Dialog
    Used to display information to the players while interrupting the game.
    MainView
    Main View containing all panels.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    ColorPalette
    Colors defined in the specifications.
    Resource
    This enumeration loads all the images needed for the game.
